short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows custom names of CF Users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mr. Stalker is a tool that allows users to save nicknames for the Codeforces handles to avoid confusion. And, every handle is appended by the saved name on everytime a Codeforces page is opened.
